channel.title: +०४ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +०४ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: THE BUILDING OF THE ALTAR. THE FIRST LAYER.
item.description: 01 Being about to build Agni (the fire-altar), he takes him up into his own self; for from out of his own self he causes him to be born, and wherefrom one is born, suchlike he becomes. Now were he to build up Agni without taking him up into his own self, he would beget man from man, mortal from mortal, one not freed from sin from one not freed from sin; but when he builds up Agni after taking him up into his own self, he causes Agni to be born from Agni, the immortal from the immortal, the sinless from the sinless.

item.title: UNKNOWN_TITLE
item.description: 01 He puts a Svayam-ātr̥ṇṇā (naturally-perforated brick) on (the gold man);–the (first) naturally-perforated one being this earth, he thus puts this earth thereon. He puts it on so as not to be separate from the man; for the naturally-perforated one means food, and the naturally-perforated one means this earth, and this earth is food, since it is on her that all food ripens: he thus places food close to him (the man, Agni).
